Workflow.Name: Request approval for Dynamics 365 Business Central sales order
Workflow.Description: When a sales order is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, send an approval request. On approval, allows additional actions to be taken on that sales document.

LocalizedName.description: Request approval for Dynamics 365 Business Central sales order

Description.description: When a sales order is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, send an approval request. On approval, allows additional actions to be taken on that sales document.
